column5: Fished LSC from the 11th to the 14th with only one muskie.  Had a good time though and learned some along the way.  First time out in my new boat so it was difficult not to have a good time.  Had two on fishing the hump one on a board and the other on the long line.  My father caught a 39" muskie in 15fow out from the Thames.  We were going through a weed bed and just as the weeds were thinning out it hit.  My fathers largest fish so he was happy and so was I.  He just comes along for the ride really but he has fun.  He was using a perch shad.  I had also dropped my speed down to 3mph.  Stayed at the Belle River Yacht Club and it was great.  Perfect for a bunch of guys going fishing.  Rooms were clean and its right on the Belle River.  If your doing the family thing though Deerbrook is better.  I'm thinking of going back in Sept. or Oct.
Thanks for the report Shakes. I heard they were active over the weekend with the new moon and all...
Yep, Lake St Clair.  I just wish it was closer to home.  I normally fish Balsam as I can be on the lake in under two hours.
